entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Why won’t you use the Defense Production Act for Coronavirus test supplies that are already needed to complete testing in less than 2days? We are short now & it will only get worse! @AsaHutchinson, Republican Gov. of Arkansas has been pushing it, because he knows it’s critical!
